item.title: Lock it Pl0x$h!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:3, topic:92121”]You aren’t going to get it any more.
Reputation isn’t about quantity; rep is about quality.
Making a thread about this did the opposite what you wanted it to do.
Also, you are calling taharok great, favourite mod, etc. but for what? He gave you X rep with his large rep power to get 50+ and now you expect to get CM? (No offence to taharok, you’re cool man).
So basically, if someone deserves CM, doesn’t cheat and is patient, they get it. Else not.

Nope, this will definitely not qualify you for being a CM, sorry.[/quote]

Rep is about nothing

LIEK WOWOW LOOK HOW BIG MY REP PENIS IS

<----------

Read full topic

item.title: Lock it Pl0x$h!
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

You aren’t going to get it any more.
Reputation isn’t about quantity; rep is about quality.
Making a thread about this did the opposite what you wanted it to do.
Also, you are calling taharok great, favourite mod, etc. but for what? He gave you X rep with his large rep power to get 50+ and now you expect to get CM? (No offence to taharok, you’re cool man).
So basically, if someone deserves CM, doesn’t cheat and is patient, they get it. Else not.

Nope, this will definitely not qualify you for being a CM, sorry.
